assertions.name: attributeContains

parameters.name: selector
parameters.descr: The selector (CSS / Xpath) used to locate the element.

parameters.name: attribute
parameters.descr: The attribute name

parameters.name: expected
parameters.descr: The expected contained value of the attribute to check.

parameters.name: message
parameters.descr: Optional log message to display in the output. If missing, one is displayed by default.

assertions.descr: Checks if the given attribute of an element contains the expected value.
